forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
